forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain for the afternoon hours. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain for the afternoon hours. High 59F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
